item.title: Many Worlds Game
item.description: Resources Many Worlds Card Sheet Figma Notes First idea What if there was some sort of game that was sort of like a tarrot deck, sort of like a trading card game, sort of like a world building rpg where you played driving forces, events or things from your hand and used them to shape the history of a world and imagine it’s future?
